title: As first half of Enable's illustrious career appears to draw to a close, thoughts turn to her future as a broodmare
text:
Getting gunned down in a Parisian quagmire took nothing away from one of the greatest race mares we have ever seen. Enable won the Prix de l’Arc De Triomphe twice plus a heap of other top races; but her blinding turn of foot was blunted by the French mud.

So as the first half of her illustrious career appears to draw to a close, thoughts have already turned to her future as a broodmare. Can she possibly match the legacy of her great grand mother, Urban Sea, who also won the Arc De Triomphe?

For the record, Urban Sea is the mother of Galileo, the 2001 Derby winner who has sired four Derby winners as well as superstars Frankel and Nathaniel. She also bore Sea The Stars, winner of the 2,000 Guineas,...
description: Getting gunned down in a Parisian quagmire took nothing away from one of the greatest race mares we have ever seen.
